1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.Time
4  ( -- * Data type
5    Time (..),
6
7    -- * Construct
8    timeYmd, timeYmdc,
9    timeFromYmAb, timeFromYwAb,
10    timeFromDczAb,
11    timeFromMjd, timeMjd,
12    timeMapDate, timeMapMjd, timePrecision,
13
14    -- * First day
15    timeFloorMonth, timeFloorYear,
16    timeCeilMonth, timeCeilYaer,
17    -- $FirstDay
18
19    -- * Range
20    timeRangeDay, timeRangeMonth, timeRangeYear,
21
22    -- * Arithmetic
23    timeAddDay, timeAddWeek, timeAddMonth, timeAddYear,
24    timeAddClock, timeDiff,
25  ) where
26
27import qualified Data.Time.Calendar                     as T
28import qualified Data.Time.Calendar.WeekDate            as T
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture               as O
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.Clock   as D
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.Date    as D
33import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message           as Msg
34import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Message      as Msg
35
36
37-- ----------------------  Time
38
39data Time
40    = TimeYmdcz D.Date D.Clock D.Sec  -- ^ Date and time with time zone
41    | TimeYmdc  D.Date D.Clock        -- ^ Date and time
42    | TimeYmd   D.Date                -- ^ Year, month, and day
43    | TimeYw    D.MJDay               -- ^ Year and week
44    | TimeYm    D.MJDay               -- ^ Year and month
45      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
46
47timeYmdc  :: D.MJDay -> D.Clock -> Time
48timeYmdc   = TimeYmdc . D.Monthly
49
50timeYmd   :: D.MJDay -> Time
51timeYmd    = TimeYmd . D.Monthly
52
53timeMjd :: Time -> D.DayCount
54timeMjd = T.toModifiedJulianDay . timeDay
55
56timeDay :: Time -> D.MJDay
57timeDay (TimeYmdcz d _ _)        = D.dateDay d
58timeDay (TimeYmdc  d _)          = D.dateDay d
59timeDay (TimeYmd   d)            = D.dateDay d
60timeDay (TimeYw    d)            = d
61timeDay (TimeYm    d)            = d
62
63timePrecision :: Time -> String
64timePrecision (TimeYmdcz _ c _)  = D.clockPrecision c ++ " zone"
65timePrecision (TimeYmdc  _ c)    = D.clockPrecision c
66timePrecision (TimeYmd   _)      = "day"
67timePrecision (TimeYw    _)      = "week"
68timePrecision (TimeYm    _)      = "month"
69
70timeMapDay :: O.Map D.MJDay -> O.Map Time
71timeMapDay f (TimeYmdcz d c z)   = TimeYmdcz (D.dateMapDay f d) c z
72timeMapDay f (TimeYmdc  d c)     = TimeYmdc  (D.dateMapDay f d) c
73timeMapDay f (TimeYmd   d)       = TimeYmd   (D.dateMapDay f d)
74timeMapDay f (TimeYw    d)       = TimeYw    (f d)
75timeMapDay f (TimeYm    d)       = TimeYm    (f d)
76
77timeMapDate :: O.Map D.Date -> O.Map Time
78timeMapDate f (TimeYmdcz d c z)  = TimeYmdcz (f d) c z
79timeMapDate f (TimeYmdc  d c)    = TimeYmdc  (f d) c
80timeMapDate f (TimeYmd   d)      = TimeYmd   (f d)
81timeMapDate _ (TimeYw    d)      = TimeYw    d
82timeMapDate _ (TimeYm    d)      = TimeYm    d
83
84
85-- ----------------------  Write
86
87instance B.MixEncode Time where
88    mixEncode = timeToMix
89
90timeToMix :: Time -> B.MixText
91timeToMix time =
92    case time of
93      TimeYmdcz d c z  -> dcz d c z `B.mixSep` szone z
94      TimeYmdc  d c    -> dc d c
95      TimeYmd   d      -> B.mixEncode d
96      TimeYw    day    -> yw $ T.toWeekDate  day
97      TimeYm    day    -> ym $ T.toGregorian day
98    where
99      dcz               :: D.Date -> D.Clock -> D.Sec -> B.MixText
100      dcz d c z         = let c'  = D.clockAddSec z c
101                              day = D.clockDayCount c'
102                          in dc (day `D.dateAdd` d) (D.clockCutDay c')
103
104      dc                :: D.Date -> D.Clock -> B.MixText
105      dc d c            = B.mixEncode d `B.mixSep` D.clockBodyToMix c
106
107      zone z            = hm $ D.dhmsFromSec z
108      szone z           = case z `compare` 0 of
109                            EQ -> B.mixString "UTC"
110                            LT -> B.mixString "-" B.<> zone z
111                            GT -> B.mixString "+" B.<> zone z
112
113      hm (_, h, m, _)   = B.mixJoin ":"  [D.mix02 h, D.mix02 m]
114      yw (y, w, _)      = B.mixJoin "-#" [B.mixDec y, B.mixDec w]
115      ym (y, m, _)      = B.mixJoin "-"  [B.mixDec y, D.mix02 m]
116
117
118-- ----------------------  Construct
119
120-- | Create time data from year and month.
121timeFromYmAb :: D.Year -> D.Month -> B.Ab Time
122timeFromYmAb y m =
123    case T.fromGregorianValid y m 1 of
124      Just day -> Right $ TimeYm day
125      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y m 1
126
127-- | Create time data from year and week.
128timeFromYwAb :: D.Year -> D.Week -> B.Ab Time
129timeFromYwAb y w =
130    case T.fromWeekDateValid y w 1 of
131      Just day -> Right $ TimeYw day
132      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y w 1
133
134-- | Create time data from date, clock, and time zone.
135timeFromDczAb :: D.Date -> D.Clock -> Maybe D.Sec -> B.Ab Time
136timeFromDczAb d c Nothing   = Right $ TimeYmdc  d c
137timeFromDczAb d c (Just z)  = Right $ TimeYmdcz d c z
138
139timeFromYmd :: D.Year -> D.Month -> D.Day -> Time
140timeFromYmd y m d = timeYmd $ T.fromGregorian y m d
141
142timeFromYmdTuple :: D.YmdTuple -> Time
143timeFromYmdTuple = timeYmd . dayFromYmdTuple where
144    dayFromYmdTuple (y, m, d) = T.fromGregorian y m d
145
146timeYmdTuple :: Time -> D.YmdTuple
147timeYmdTuple = T.toGregorian . timeDay
148
149-- | Create time data form modified Julian date.
150timeFromMjd :: D.DayCount -> Time
151timeFromMjd = timeYmd . T.ModifiedJulianDay
152
153timeMapMjd :: O.Map D.DayCount -> O.Map Time
154timeMapMjd f time = timeMapDay g time where
155    g (T.ModifiedJulianDay d) = T.ModifiedJulianDay $ f d
156
157
158-- ----------------------  First day
159
160-- $FirstDay
161--
162--  /Examples/
163--
164--  The first day of month.
165--
166--    >>> timeFloorMonth $ timeFromYmd 2014 11 3
167--    TimeYmd 2014-11-01
168--
169--  The first day of year.
170--
171--    >>> timeFloorYear $ timeFromYmd 2014 11 3
172--    TimeYmd 2014-01-01
173--
174--  The first day of next month.
175--
176--    >>> timeCeilMonth $ timeFromYmd 2014 11 3
177--    TimeYmd 2014-12-01
178--
179--  The first day of next year.
180--
181--    >>> timeCeilYaer $ timeFromYmd 2014 11 3
182--    TimeYmd 2015-01-01
183
184timeFloorMonth :: O.Map Time
185timeFloorMonth time =
186    case timeYmdTuple time of
187      (y, m, _) -> timeFromYmd y m 1
188
189timeFloorYear :: O.Map Time
190timeFloorYear time =
191    case timeYmdTuple time of
192      (y, _, _) -> timeFromYmd y 1 1
193
194timeCeilMonth :: O.Map Time
195timeCeilMonth time =
196    case timeYmdTuple time of
197      (y, m, _) -> timeFromYmdTuple $ monthStep (y, m, 1)
198
199timeCeilYaer :: O.Map Time
200timeCeilYaer time =
201    case timeYmdTuple time of
202      (y, _, _) -> timeFromYmdTuple $ yearStep (y, 1, 1)
203
204
205-- ----------------------  Range
206
207timeRangeDay :: B.RangeBy Time
208timeRangeDay from to = map timeFromMjd [timeMjd from .. timeMjd to]
209
210timeRangeMonth :: B.RangeBy Time
211timeRangeMonth = timeRangeBy monthStep
212
213timeRangeYear :: B.RangeBy Time
214timeRangeYear = timeRangeBy yearStep
215
216timeRangeBy :: O.Map D.YmdTuple -> B.RangeBy Time
217timeRangeBy step from to = times where
218    dayFrom =  timeYmdTuple from
219    dayTo   =  timeYmdTuple to
220    times   =  map timeFromYmdTuple $ B.rangeBy step dayFrom dayTo
221
222monthStep :: O.Map D.YmdTuple
223monthStep (y, m, d) | m < 12    = (y, m + 1, d)
224                    | otherwise = (y + 1, 1, d)
225
226yearStep :: O.Map D.YmdTuple
227yearStep (y, m, d)  | y == (-1) = (1, m, d)
228                    | otherwise = (y + 1, m, d)
229
230
231-- ----------------------  Add
232
233-- | Add days to time.
234timeAddDay :: D.DayCount -> O.Map Time
235timeAddDay n = timeMapMjd (+ n)
236
237-- | Add weeks to time.
238timeAddWeek :: Integer -> O.Map Time
239timeAddWeek n = timeAddDay (7 * n)
240
241-- | Add months to time.
242timeAddMonth :: Integer -> O.Map Time
243timeAddMonth n time = timeFromYmd y' (fromInteger m') d where
244    (y, m, d)  = timeYmdTuple time
245    (yd, m')   = (toInteger m + n) `divMod` 12
246    y'         = y + yd
247
248-- | Add years to time.
249timeAddYear :: D.Year -> O.Map Time
250timeAddYear n time = timeFromYmd (y + n) m d where
251    (y, m, d) = timeYmdTuple time
252
253-- | Add clock to time.
254timeAddClock :: D.Clock -> B.AbMap Time
255timeAddClock c1 (TimeYmdcz d2 c2 z2) = timeAddClockWith time c1 d2 c2 where
256    time d c = TimeYmdcz d c z2
257timeAddClock c1 (TimeYmdc d2 c2) = timeAddClockWith TimeYmdc c1 d2 c2
258timeAddClock (D.ClockD d) t@(TimeYmd _) = Right $ timeAddDay d t
259timeAddClock _ _ = Msg.adlib "add-clock"
260
261timeAddClockWith :: (D.Date -> D.Clock -> Time) -> D.Clock -> D.Date -> D.Clock -> B.Ab Time
262timeAddClockWith time c1 d2 c2 =
263    do c3 <- D.clockAdd c1 c2
264       let d3 = D.clockDayCount c3
265           c4 = D.clockCutDay   c3
266       Right $ timeAddDay d3 $ time d2 c4
267
268
269-- ----------------------  Sub
270
271-- | Calculate clock from time to time.
272timeDiff :: Time -> Time -> B.Ab D.Clock
273timeDiff (TimeYmdcz d2 c2 _) (TimeYmdcz d1 c1 _)  = timeDiffDc d2 c2 d1 c1
274timeDiff (TimeYmdc d2 c2)    (TimeYmdc d1 c1)     = timeDiffDc d2 c2 d1 c1
275timeDiff (TimeYmd d2) (TimeYmd d1)  = Right $ D.ClockD $ timeDiffDate d2 d1
276timeDiff (TimeYm  d2) (TimeYm  d1)  = Right $ D.ClockD $ timeDiffDay  d2 d1
277timeDiff _ _ = Msg.adlib "time-diff"
278
279timeDiffDc :: D.Date -> D.Clock -> D.Date -> D.Clock -> B.Ab D.Clock
280timeDiffDc d2 c2 d1 c1 =
281    do let d3 = timeDiffDate d2 d1
282       c3 <- D.clockSub c2 c1
283       Right $ D.clockAddDay d3 c3
284
285timeDiffDate :: D.Date -> D.Date -> Integer
286timeDiffDate d2 d1 = D.dateDay d2 `timeDiffDay` D.dateDay d1
287
288timeDiffDay :: D.MJDay -> D.MJDay -> Integer
289timeDiffDay d2 d1 = T.toModifiedJulianDay d2 - T.toModifiedJulianDay d1
